short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks media like images and videos from browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension blocks videos and pictures on websites but can be adjusted as needed. It helps users view websites with important information without seeing inappropriate or harmful images. This is useful for professionals who need only text from websites and for people who want to avoid upsetting images. With this tool, they can get the information they need without seeing any disturbing content.
